channel.title: Server Is Offline? I Cant PortForward, And Cant Do uTorrent, Tried Router Help
channel.description:
Okay so i tried to portforward but apparently my computer doesnt want its command prompt to work, and i tried utorrent but it always tells me that im offline, and i tried logging in on my router, but all it does is not let me do anything but type in my LAN ip not my server's.
So if someone could help me out with ANY of these it would be GREAT!

item.title: Server Is Offline? I Cant PortForward, And Cant Do uTorrent, Tried Router Help
